overview: Get your fix of tasty little sweets with Mandy Armani, Tracey Sweet, Trinity St. Clair, and Mischa Brooks! These girls have got a sweet tooth, as well as a sweet cooch, and they can't wait to satisfy all of their cravings. It's going to be a sweet and sticky time, because our girls are suckers for lollipops and cocks!
title: Lollipop Girls 2
